tested_agents.UI/UX Agent: ✅ TESTED - Responds to: fix, wide, layout, design, spacing, ui, ux
tested_agents.Implementation Agent: ✅ TESTED - Responds to: implement, fix, bug, code, feature, change
tested_agents.Testing Agent: ⚠️ AVAILABLE - Responds to: test, verify, check, qa, quality, ensure
tested_agents.Performance Agent: ⚠️ AVAILABLE - Responds to: optimize, slow, performance, speed, fast
tested_agents.Security Agent: ⚠️ AVAILABLE - Responds to: security, auth, permission, vulnerability
tested_agents.Documentation Agent: ⚠️ AVAILABLE - Responds to: document, explain, guide, readme

activation_note: ALL 6 AGENT SUBSYSTEMS SUCCESSFULLY ACTIVATED. System responds to keyword-based triggers. UI and Implementation agents tested and confirmed working. All agents are ready for collaborative work.

usage_instructions.for_claude: When user requests contain trigger keywords, run: python PROCESS_REQUEST.py 'user command'

trigger_examples.UI issues: The curriculum column is too wide → triggers UI agent
trigger_examples.Bug fixes: Fix the login error → triggers Implementation agent
trigger_examples.Testing: Run tests to verify → triggers Testing agent
trigger_examples.Performance: Optimize slow loading → triggers Performance agent
trigger_examples.Security: Check auth permissions → triggers Security agent

coordination.multi_agent: Multiple agents can collaborate on complex requests
coordination.coordinator: AgentCoordinator manages agent selection and collaboration
coordination.priority_system: Agents self-organize by relevance and expertise match
